title: Greece - September 2025 | The Global State of Democracy
snippet: On 5 September, President Katerina Sakellaropoulou signed a migration law that imposes stricter penalties on rejected asylum seekers. Under the new legislation, rejected asylum seekers must leave Greece within 14 days, down from the previous 7-30 days. Failure to comply now carries criminal ...

title: Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis’ statement on the election of Minister of National Economy and Finance Kyriakos Pierrakakis as President of the Eurogroup | Prime Minister of the Hellenic Republic
snippet: Because a Greek Minister of Finance, Kyriakos Pierrakakis, has been elected President of the Eurogroup by the member states of the eurozone. This is a great honor for him, and I warmly congratulate him.

title: 2025 Greek presidential election - Wikipedia
snippet: A third round of voting was held on 6 February 2025, where no candidate reached the reduced required majority of 180. The fourth round was held on 12 February 2025, where Konstantinos Tasoulas was elected as President of Greece.
